html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06272024-05-31LAB, ESDC
ActPay Equity Act
SubjectOrder Grouping Ministers’ Offices for the Purpose of a Pay Equity Plan
PrecisORDER GROUPING MINISTERS’ OFFICES FOR THE PURPOSE OF PAY EQUITY PLAN in order to group all ministers’ offices for the purpose of establishing and updating a single pay equity plan for their collective ministerial staff to ensure consistency in how the pay equity exercise is carried out across ministers’ offices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0116 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER GROUPING MINISTERS’ OFFICES FOR THE PURPOSE OF PAY EQUITY PLAN in order to group all ministers’ offices for the purpose of establishing and updating a single pay equity plan for their collective ministerial staff to ensure consistency in how the pay equity exercise is carried out across ministers’ offices.
